Description:
Edwardian Elegance with Extended Brilliance
Light-filled and luxurious, this captivating period residence presents an idyllic family lifestyle opportunity with its surprisingly spacious floorplan, premium features and unrivalled location in Essendon's elite schools precinct. Beyond the landscaped front garden and gorgeous facade, discover an inviting interior comprising four generous bedrooms (all with robes) and two modern bathrooms - both with heated towel rails and floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this a formal lounge with gas-log fireplace, spacious living room and open dining area complemented by a stylish stone-bench kitchen with timber cabinetry, ample cupboard space, Miele dishwasher and Siemens cooking appliances (pyrolytic oven and induction cooktop). Other highlights of the home include ducted heating and split-system air conditioning, alarm, custom lighting, plantation shutters and solid timber floors, towering ceilings, large laundry and excellent storage throughout. Step outside to a paved entertaining area complete with mains-connected BBQ and integrated bar fridge, expansive backyard garden with high fences for added privacy, irrigation front and rear, handy shed as well as front off-street parking with remote-control gate. Walking distance to PEGS, Lowther Hall and St Columba's College, it's also close to Clarinda Park, Rose Street cafes and Essendon Station, as well as easy access to Puckle Street's vibrant shopping precinct. An exceptional lifestyle in one of Essendon's most exclusive pockets!

Description:
Picture Perfect Townhouse Living
Embrace the finest in modern, low-maintenance living with this superbly spacious and spectacular townhouse. With an abundance of natural light, stunning living spaces and storage space cleverly integrated throughout, this is easy living at its best. Beyond the inviting landscaped entrance lies a light, bright and beautiful home, featuring a generous master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite, separate laundry, powder room and home office with built-in desk and shelving. An immaculately presented courtyard awaits to the rear, featuring vertical garden walls, paved alfresco dining, water feature and a discreet storage room.
• Ultra-modern townhouse with light and bright living over two levels
• Excellent location close to public transport and schools
• Fabulous open-plan living and entertainer’s courtyard
• Quality features and finishes throughout
• Abundance of storage and parking for two

This beautiful and functional home is brimming with high-tech features and modern comforts, including hydronic heating, reverse cycle units in each room, energy-efficient solar power and hot water, video intercom, stone benchtops, security alarm, ducted vacuum and automatic garage with ample storage and additional off-street parking. Appealing to both professionals and growing families, this contemporary beauty is surrounded by numerous local schools with easy access to nearby parks, freeways, city tram lines and Essendon train station. A must-see for those who crave modern perfection.
